name: CodeBulider Apps
subtitle: A source for all of my apps

privacy.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: YouTube Music uses Bluetooth to locate and connect to Chromecast and other devices.
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: YouTube Music uses Bluetooth to locate and connect to Chromecast and other devices.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: To take a profile picture, allow YouTube Music to access your camera.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: This will allow you to invite your family into your membership plan.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: Access to your network allows YouTube Music to discover and connect to devices such as your TV.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This lets you include audio with your videos.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: To save images, allow YouTube Music to access your photo library.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: To choose a profile picture, allow YouTube Music to access your photos.

privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: This lets you create videos using the app.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: To personalize ads and provide ad measurement, YouTube will link activity from this app with activity from non-Google apps and websites.
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: YouTube needs bluetooth access to scan for nearby Cast devices.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: Access to your network allows YouTube to discover and connect to devices such as your TV.
privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: This lets you add your own audio files to your videos.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This lets you include audio with your videos and search using your voice.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Makes it easier for you to attach location information to your videos and live streams and allows for features such as improved recommendations and ads.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: Your contacts will be sent to YouTube servers to help you find friends to share videos with.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This lets you upload media you've already created.

privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: This will let you play your imported music on Spotify.
privacy.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: This lets you unlock new ways of interacting with other devices compatible with Spotify via Bluetooth.
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: This lets you unlock new ways of interacting with other devices compatible with Spotify via Bluetooth.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: This lets you scan Spotify Codes.
privacy.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: This lets you set access restrictions using Face ID.
privacy.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: Spotify will use HealthKit data to provide personalised audio recommendations for your workouts.
privacy.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: Spotify will use HealthKit data to provide personalised audio recommendations for your workouts.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: This lets you listen on different devices. Spotify will also get access to local audio files.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This lets you control Spotify using your voice.
privacy.NSMotionUsageDescription: We will use this to understand which audio motivates you most.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This lets you save images to your Photo Library.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This lets you select images from your Photo Library.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: Your data will be used to deliver personalized ads or content to you.

privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: To view and manage your contacts in OldOS, please enable access to your contacts list.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: To view, manage, and add photos to your photo library in OldOS, please enable access. Then close and re-open the Photos app.
privacy.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: To enable maps to work properly, and see your current wifi network in Settings, please enable access to your location. Then close and re-open the Maps app.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: To enable maps to work properly, and see your current wifi network in Settings, please enable access to your location. Then close and re-open the Maps app.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: To take photos in OldOS, please enable access to your camera.
privacy.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: To enable maps to work properly, and see your current wifi network in Settings, please enable access to your location. Then close and re-open the Maps app.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: To view, manage, and add photos to your photo library in OldOS, please enable access. Then close and re-open the Photos app.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: To record your audio while filming a video in OldOS, please in enable microphone access.
privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: To view, play, and experience your music in OldOS, please enable access to your music library.

privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: To take a photo with your camera and extract or generate text for it, please allow access to Camera in your device Settings.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: We would like to access your microphone to allow the application create voice memos for you during theory test
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: To enter text from a photo or to generate text for an image, please allow access to Photos in your device Settings.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: To enter text from a photo or to generate text for an image, please allow access to Photos in your device Settings.
privacy.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: We would like to recognize your speech to use the app in hands-free mode
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: Your data will be used to bring you timely and relevant content and make your experience with the app more personalized.
